'''''She's Already Tense''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Memories of the Heart]]''.

To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete ''[[Thesis Defense Practice]]'' with the lowest Layla's anxiety level possible.

This is achieved by selecting "Don't be nervous. Just explain what you've learned." in ''[[The Helper]]'' and "Can you briefly describe the application of the law of triple-orbit shift calculation?" in ''Thesis Defense Practice''.
